verses.1: Ka ta aw, ka pilna le ka thumuhnate, limtakin ngai-in hong za in.
verses.2: Tua hileh a kilawmin na gamtatzia ding na thei dinga, na kampaunate in na pil lamtak hong kilangsak ding hi.
verses.3: Numei paktatteʼ kampau khuaizu bangin khum mahmah in a thugente uh a neel dakdak hangin,
verses.4: a tawpna ah lungkhamna le natna sim loh nangma tungah bangmah dang hong guan lo hi.
verses.5: Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih dinga, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tunna lampi ahi hi.
verses.6: Nuntakna lampi ah amah om lo a, nang na phawk loh hangin amah lam pialin a vakvai ahi hi.
verses.7: Tate aw, tu-in ka thugente limtakin hong ngai unla, ka thugente mangngilh kei un.
verses.8: Tua bang numei tawh kineh kha kei unla, a inn gei nangawn ah pai kha kei un.
verses.9: Tua bang na hih kei uh leh na min hoihna teng uh midang tungah tung dinga, hehpihna a nei lo miteʼ khutlum tawh na khansih ding uh hi.
verses.10: Khual mite in na neihsa teng uh la dinga, na sep sa khempeuh uh midangte in ngah ding uh hi.
verses.11: Na sih kuan uh ciangin thumin na tau ding uh a, gawngin na guh guak bekun na om ding uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin, “Bang hangin thu thei hoh lo a, hong kihilhna mang hoh lo ka hi hiam?
verses.13: Kei hong hilh siateʼ thu ka mang nuam kei a, amauʼ hong hilhnate ka don kei kha hi.
verses.14: Tua ahih manin tu-in ka cimawh vat a, miʼ mai ah ka min a sia hi,” na ci ciat ding uh hi.
verses.15: Na ziʼ tungah citak inla, amah bek itin nei in.
verses.16: Pasal dang tawh va vak zau in kongzing lakah va mawh kha ding hi.
verses.17: Na zi pen nangma ading bek hi a, midangte tawh na neihkhawm ding hi lo hi.
verses.18: Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim inla, na teenpih numei tawh lungdam in.
verses.19: A it-huai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung inla, ama ngaihbaanna tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
verses.20: Ka ta aw, bang hangin numei dang lunggulh dinga, numei dangteʼ ngaihbaanna iplah ding na hi hiam?
verses.21: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in na gamtatna khempeuh hong mu a, na paina khempeuh ah nang hong en kawikawi hi.
verses.22: Migilo paʼ mawhna thangzak bang hi a, ama mawhna thang sung mahah amah a awk hi.
verses.23: Ama pumpi ki-uk zo lo ahih manin amah in sih lawh a, ama hai luatna in hankhuk sung a tun hi.
